A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It was OK at best.  I have been a fan for 40 years and didn't walk out as mad as I did when I watched Phantom Menace but it was pretty horrid.  

Don't want to give too many spoilers but:
1. "Bombs" don't drop in space.
2. Decoder rings are just dumb
3. Too many stupid jokes\, you didn't even try.
4. Snoke? Really?

Don't waste your money or at least go during an inexpensive show.
